channel.title: does the girl power bonus stack?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "does the girl power bonus stack?"

item.title: Re: does the girl power bonus stack?
item.content:encoded: Just ran a mission with Super Robogirls using Running man jutsu. I was able to use the jutsu, but I did not get the bonus Friendship. It also did not increment my Running Man counter, but I already have FoA, so that may be normal. Most likely you can not use (Super) Robo Girls if you're going for FoA.

item.title: Re: does the girl power bonus stack?
item.content:encoded:
Teams do not stack. My understanding of Running man is that you need to have a Girl Power team specifically for it to count.

Edit: Ren Po Ken ninj'd me :)

item.title: Re: does the girl power bonus stack?
item.content:encoded:
Nope. You get the Robogirls bonus and that's it.

One of the first things I checked when I went Monochrome. Apparently Girl Power is only checked for if it's not a team already.

Didn't try it with Running Man, already had FoA. I will try it out tomorrow.

item.title: does the girl power bonus stack?
item.content:encoded:
if you have an all girl team that already has a bonus, do you also get the girl power bonus? or do you get to choose or is it only the original bonus you get?

e.g:Robo Girls! - Robogirl, Sporty, Scary: +1 Reaper Nin Strength, +1 Reaper Range!

this has no use in normal missions unless you also get the girl power team, and it would also be very useful when having the road to womanhood.

and if you don't get the girl power bonus, can you stil use that team for using the running man?
